name: The Last Sanctuary
description:
The Last Sanctuary is a game about humanity, doomed and forsaken in the future. A large community has been secured deep underground in a bunker of sorts. To prevent favoritism, you will oversee all inhabitants and you will aid them in moral and ethical problems. All from within your lonely space station will you guide the last sanctuary on earth.

Join the discord server for development, questions, a fantastic community, and say hi!

The game is rich in features:

  • Many endings (for humanity)!
  • High scores (exportable/importable).
  • Decision-based gameplay.
  • A handful of puzzling achievements.
  • Art provided by Bogdan.
  • Music/audio by Cryo Chamber.
  • Easy controls (point-and-click).
  • Short play through time (or long).

Little note:

The game is "done", but most art will be replaced soon because roughly 15 pieces are made by me because I didn't want to rush Bogdan. Also, some texts could be a little raw and need some editing, please let me know in the discord server if you find any!

Important notice:

If experiencing "No valid storage adapters found", please enable cookies for itch.io in general or specifically for this page. The Last Sanctuary requires "cookies", not to track your personal life, but to store saves. The same happens when playing through incognito, please play in a non-incognito window.

If exporting high score files, please do not mess with them. They are encrypted and if edited you could permanently break your score.
